mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.TASK_ID_ FROM act_ru_identitylink a LEFT JOIN act_ru_task t ON a.TASK_ID_ = t.ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_execution e ON t.PROC_INST_ID_ = e.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN wf_base B ON E.BUSINESS_KEY_ = B.ID WHERE a.USER_ID_ = #{userName} AND a.type_ = 'candidate' AND b.ID = #{businessKey} ORDER BY B.APPLY_DATE DESC
